verbs.description: [ARG0: The FBI] [ARGM-TMP: first] [V: flagged] [ARG1: " derogatory information " about Rob Porter , one of President Donald Trump 's closest aides ,] [ARG2: to the White House counsel 's office] [ARGM-TMP: in March 2017] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a new timeline provided by the FBI] ...

The FBI first flagged " derogatory information " about Rob Porter , one of President Donald Trump 's closest aides , to the White House counsel 's office in March 2017 , [V: according] to a new timeline provided by the FBI ...
